00021 #include <iostream>
00022 using namespace std;
00023 
00024 #include <starter.h>
00025 #include "object_view.h"
00026 
00027 // Constructor for training stage:
00028 object_view::object_view(PyrImage * _image) : 
00029                 image(cvCreateImage(cvGetSize(_image->images[0]), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 1), _image->nbLev),
00030                 gradX(cvCreateImage(cvGetSize(_image->images[0]), IPL_DEPTH_16S, 1), _image->nbLev),
00031                 gradY(cvCreateImage(cvGetSize(_image->images[0]), IPL_DEPTH_16S, 1), _image->nbLev)
00032 {
00033 }
00034 
00035 // Constructor for recognition stage (alloc memory once):
00036 object_view::object_view(int width, int height, int nbLev) : 
00037                 image(cvCreateImage(cvSize(width, height), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 1), nbLev),
00038                 gradX(cvCreateImage(cvSize(width, height), IPL_DEPTH_16S, 1), nbLev),
00039                 gradY(cvCreateImage(cvSize(width, height), IPL_DEPTH_16S, 1), nbLev)
00040 {
00041 }
00042 
00043 void object_view::build_from_image_0(int kernelSize)
00044 {
00045   if (kernelSize == 0)
00046     image.build();
00047   else
00048   {
00049     image.smoothLevel0(kernelSize);
00050     image.build();
00051   }
00052   comp_gradient();
00053 }
00054 
00055 void object_view::build(IplImage *im, int kernelSize) 
00056 {
00057   if (kernelSize == 0)
00058     cvCopy(im, image[0]);
00059   else if (kernelSize < 0)
00060     cvSmooth(im, image[0], CV_GAUSSIAN, 3, 3);
00061   else
00062     cvSmooth(im, image[0], CV_GAUSSIAN, kernelSize, kernelSize);
00063   image.build();
00064   comp_gradient();
00065 }
00066 
00067 void object_view::comp_gradient()
00068 {
00069   for (int l = 0; l < image.nbLev; ++l) {
00070     cvSobel(image[l], gradX[l], 1, 0, 1);
00071     cvSobel(image[l], gradY[l], 0, 1, 1);
00072   }
00073 }
00074 
00075 object_view::~object_view()
00076 {
00077 }
